content: अनिमि(मे)ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Not winking, steadfastly or intently fixed; °लोचनं सुचिरमालोक्य <ls>K. 102</ls>; °पक्ष्मणा <ls n="K.">131</ls>; शतैस्तमक्ष्णामनिमेषवृत्तिभिः <ls>R. 3. 43</ls>; °दर्शनरमणीयैः <ls>K. 50</ls> fish and twinkleless glances. {@--2@} Vigilant, watchful. {@--3@} Open (as eyes, flowers). --षः {@--1@} A god (for the eyes of gods do not twinkle); <ls>Śi. 5. 57.</ls> {@--2@} A fish. {@--3@} Viṣṇu. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Mahākāla.
